data.name: Pipeline/identification
data.description: The activity is being scoped or planned

data.name: Implementation
data.description: The activity is currently being implemented

data.name: Completion
data.description: Physical activity is complete or the final disbursement has been made.

data.name: Post-completion
data.description: Physical activity is complete or the final disbursement has been made, but the activity remains open pending financial sign off or M&E

data.name: Suspended
data.description: The activity has been temporarily suspended

metadata.name: Activity Status
metadata.description: Lifecycle status of the activity from pipeline to completion
